definition[0]: having qualities considered to be typical of men or of what men do
example[0]: They’re nice curtains, but I’d prefer something a little more masculine.
example[1]: She has a very masculine voice.
example[2]: Hunting was a typically masculine occupation.
definition[1]: in some languages, a masculine noun, pronoun etc belongs to a class of words that have different inflections from feminine or neuter words
example[3]: The word for ‘book’ is masculine in French.
